mapper.select: SELECT '111' userId, 'Hailey' userName, '02-0000-1111' phoneNumber FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '222' userId, 'Dana' userName, '031-0000-2222' phoneNumber FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '333' userId, 'Emma' userName, '02-0000-3333' phoneNumber FROM DUAL
SELECT HRIKORNAM, HRIEMLADD, HRITELNUM, HRIDEPART, HRITEAMLD, HRIEMPDUT, HRIPOSITI FROM HUMRESINF
SELECT CODENAME_EX FROM TWBAS_BASECODE WHERE BUSINESS = '카카오워크' AND BUN = '구현api' AND VALUE = '1'
